title: Pathfinder Visualiser
description: Pathfinder Visualizer is an interactive web application built using the React framework that allows users to visually explore and understand various pathfinding and maze generation algorithms in real-time. The tool provides an intuitive and engaging way to observe how different algorithms traverse grids, find optimal paths, and navigate obstacles.

title: Boggle
description: This C++ program generates a random Boggle board, builds a Trie-based dictionary, and finds all valid words present. It efficiently implements DFS search for word detection.

title: Pinterest Clone
description: A simple pinterest Clone with end to end functionalities
